title: Connection Failed
body: First post on the boards. I've been around here for a while but never have had a reason to post. It all started earlier today, when I was playing in a match and lost connection, and was unable to reconnect. upon further inspection, I was unable to connect to any websites other than google related things(such as google itself and youtube). I finally resolved that issue and was able to connect to regular websites again, however, I'm getting a connection error when trying to log into League of Legends. Does anyone have solutions? (I've tried some things already but none of it seems to work.) Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Since I'm a bit delayed in writing a post back to you, I wanted to see if you are still experiencing issues at all or whether this was a temporary issue regarding your internet.

Reply back and let me know if you would still like some help!
